name: Trust
description: You Can Trust Players So Shy Doesent Take Effect.  im too tired for this

actions.command: /execute as @e[distance=0.01..,limit=1,sort=nearest] if score @s jdi_origins_spirit_fox_shy_selector matches 2 run scoreboard players remove @s jdi_origins_spirit_fox_shy_selector 2
execute as @e[distance=0.01..,limit=1,sort=nearest] if score @s jdi_origins_spirit_fox_shy_selector matches 1 run scoreboard players add @s jdi_origins_spirit_fox_shy_selector 1
